title: Trading Skins
body: We all know that you might have skins for champs that you don't play or will ever play, but your friend plays the champ and he/she doesn't have a skin for that champ so it'll be a great idea to start trading skins with each other by giving you skin in return. It can be only club members can trade skins with members of the same club and so people don't get in your club just to trade skins have a 1-month window for clubs.

replies.body:
While it would be cool and fun, it will never happen
It would make riot lose a lot of money, so it would be a dumb idea for them to do it

if they make it so that u trade skins with equal value maybe  :? or how about just giving someone a skin you own. no trade.
would love to transfer a wukong skin from an alt account to my main. whats the harm in that. u already got the skin.
Harm is you wouldnt have to buy the skin on your main. If you like it you are likely to buy it at some point. This is exactly why it wont ever happen. It could be abused the he'll out of with alts.
id love this but itll never happen because riot would lose money
